column4: Wells Fargo to move securities arm to New York's West Side
column5: Wells Fargo & Co  will move the New York headquarters of its investment banking and securities business to Hudson Yards  the mammoth project under construction on Manhattan's West Side  in 2020  developers of the site said on Friday.

column4: UPDATE 2-Wells Fargo to move securities arm to New York's West Side
column5: Dec 11 Wells Fargo & Co will move the New York headquarters of its investment banking and securities business to Hudson Yards  the mammoth project under construction on Manhattan's West Side  in 2020  developers of the site said on Friday.

column4: Wells Fargo to move securities arm to New York's West Side
column5: Dec 11 Wells Fargo & Co is moving the New York headquarters of its Wells Fargo Securities arm to Manhattan's West Side  to 30 Hudson Yards  which is currently under development  the company said in a statement.
